alert.note: Alert for Ashtabula; Trumbull (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 01 at 5:10PM EDT until June 01 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Trumbull County in northeastern Ohio... Southeastern Ashtabula County in northeastern Ohio... Southwestern Crawford County in northwestern Pennsylvania... * Until 600 PM EDT. * At 510 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Kinsman, or 17 miles north of Warren, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Kinsman, Orwell, Adamsville, Atlantic, Pymatuning Central, Jamestown and Hartstown. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
